alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:58PM CDT until May 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Thayer County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 958 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Deshler, or 22 miles north of Belleville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. A few stations have reported wind speeds of 55 to 60 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Belvidere around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Alexandria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
